meanings.definition: Not having the physical or biological qualities of a male.
meanings.sent1: The flower was nonvirile, with no pollen to reproduce.
meanings.sent2: The nonvirile bird lacked the bright colors of the male species.
meanings.sent3: The nonvirile tree tried to grow fruit, but it just couldn't.
meanings.sent4: His nonvirile voice was drowned out by the deep baritone of his friend.
meanings.sent5: The nonvirile lion's mane was thin and lacked the majestic look of the alpha male.

meanings.sent1: The old bridge was nonvirile, unable to bear heavy loads anymore.
meanings.sent2: After the illness, he felt nonvirile and struggled to lift even light objects.
meanings.sent3: The nonvirile puppy tried to chase the ball but ran out of energy quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her nonvirile attempt at lifting the box ended in embarrassment as it slipped from her grasp.
meanings.sent5: The nonvirile plant wilted under the harsh sun, showing its lack of vitality.
